column1: #Text=Vincenzo Calvesi ( fl. 1777 – 1811 ) was an Italian operatic tenor and impresario .
#Text=A skillful lyric tenor , he began his career performing in opera houses in Italy during the 1770s .
#Text=He was active in Dresden in 1782 to 1783 and then spent most of his time performing in Vienna from 1785 to 1794 .
#Text=He is best remembered today for creating the role of Ferrando in the world premiere of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart 's Così fan tutte in 1790 .
#Text=That same year the Viennese publication Grundsätze zur Theaterkritik described him as " one of the best tenors from Italy…with a voice naturally sweet , pleasant and sonorous .
